exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rmri : raft_msg_refinement_interface rlmli : refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface glci : ghost_log_correct_interface lphogli : log_properties_hold_on_ghost_logs_interface tsi : term_sanity_interface aelsi : allEntries_leader_sublog_interface glaei : ghost_log_allEntries_interface net : network h : name st' : name -> data ps' : list packet gd : electionsData out : list raft_output d : raft_data l : list (name * msg) H_handle_timeout : handleTimeout h (snd (nwState net h)) = (out, d, l) H_gd_upd : gd = update_elections_data_timeout h (nwState net h) P : ghost_log_entries_match_host net /\\ ghost_log_entries_match_nw net H_reachable : msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net H_st_update : forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (gd, d) h' H_packet_subset : forall p' : packet, In p' ps' -> In p' (nwPackets net) \\/ In p' (send_packets h (add_ghost_msg h (gd, d) l)) h', p' : packet Unable to unify "forall p' : packet, In p' ps' -> In p' (nwPackets net) \\/ In p' (send_packets h (add_ghost_msg h (gd, d) l))" with "In h' (nwPackets {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}) -> In p' (nwPackets {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}) -> entries_match (fst (pBody h')) (fst (pBody p'))".

original: intros. unfold msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout, ghost_log_entries_match in *. intros net h st' ps' gd out d l H_handle_timeout H_gd_upd P H_reachable H_st_update H_packet_subset. split. - unfold ghost_log_entries_match_host in *. intros h' p Hin. apply H in Hin. destruct Hin as [H_host H_nw]. split. + unfold ghost_log_entries_match_host in H_host. apply H_host in H_nw. apply H_nw. + unfold ghost_log_entries_match_nw in H_nw. apply H_nw in H_nw. apply H_nw. - intros h' p'. apply H_packet_subset.
